overview: Vasia thе Pedestrian is a football fan of Brest Dynamo. He has befallen 5 golden seasons that means he has visited every play of the team. He travels to away matches on foot. In 2016 he has passed 4 470 km – no hitch-hiking, no money, spending nights in the wood. Football has saved him from prison. Road has been saving him from death. Vasia has opened intuitively a universal formula: when there is no hope and you see no meaning of life – just keep on «footing».
title: A Fan
